messages.message: Is dogfood file system down? I can’t access any drives
we deactivate some of the S3 keys for compliance (since the usage are not traceable, this could be one of them)
which drive are you looking for accessing
hmm I can’t access Instabase Drive
Got `Failure during stat` for all fs calls
where did those fs calls come from? were you running tests ?
It’s failing everywhere. I tried cypress tests, api calls that invoke file service, also directly accessing file explorer

I'm getting this as well - even when using the admin account

`2024/07/29 14:16:25 ERROR fileservice/clients/s3_client.go:374 -- Failure during stat. Path: 37c19bc6-5b57-4ba9-a252-49eacac2e174/Applications/Deployed/All/3d1963b8-4868-4c46-b595-85af9e1b43c7/icon.png Err: operation error S3: HeadObject, https response error StatusCode: 403, RequestID: C6XAFDA6D4TGB0W8, HostID: QM7Pv0ApP/kluFasmxKgmolG+lbe04WbkHb1x2Xz0dkcy76jmNqV6hrz4tgLTeBHsSZHttwpdkp9B9+WwYf+KA==, api error Forbidden: Forbidden`

@derrick.smith can we reactivate the key for now? Thanks
Key with ID `AKIARG3DSRG3W6HYVOXG` has been reactivated
Confirmed I can access file system now
@derrick.smith can we reactivate prod key as well :thanks:
Done! Key ID `AKIARG3DSRG3YZVZNOVG` reactivated as well
